meaningMnemonic: <radical>Compare</radical> the <radical>sun</radical> with a <radical>tsunami</radical> – these two things don’t <kanji>mix</kanji>. If a tsunami is coming, it will likely get in the way of the sun.
readingMnemonic: Just before the tsunami crashes over you, a <reading>con</reading>dor (こん) swoops out of the sky and grabs you up. This condor must be a <kanji>mix</kanji> – a normal condor is not strong enough to pick up a human. The condor must be mixed with something else. Like a pterodactyl.
